data: Anna | Bridget McGrady | Mrs. Tierney | Mrs. Gilmore

“Anna’s purty, an' she’s good as well as purty, but th' beauty an' goodness that’s hers is short lived, I’m thinkin',” said old Bridget McGrady to her neighbor Mrs. Tierney, as Mrs. Gilmore passed the door, leading her five-year-old girl, Anna, by the hand.
My Lady of the Chimney Corner
